body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Richard Gonzalez. May I have your name, please?

Hi, Richard. My name is Donna Price.

Thank you, Donna. How can I assist you today?

I'm having some issues with the quality of your online violin classes. It's quite frustrating.

I'm sorry to hear that, Donna. Could you please specify the exact problem you are facing with our online classes?

The videos are often blurry, and it's difficult to follow along with the lessons.

I understand your concern. To better address this, could I get your email address to follow up on this issue?

Sure, it's donna.price@example.com.

Thank you, and one more thing, could you please provide me with your student ID number?

It's one two three four five six.

I appreciate the information, Donna. We will look into this matter and work to improve the quality of your classes. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and thank you for your time.

Thank you, Richard. I hope it gets better soon.

You're welcome, Donna. Have a great day ahead!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Richard Gonzalez from a random business discusses product quality with Donna Price. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

Thank you, Richard. I hope it gets better soon.

You're welcome, Donna. Have a great day ahead!
